Carlos vive con su pareja y sus dos hijos en el distrito D. Wanchaq. El distrito D. Wanchaq se encuentra ubicado en L. provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco, llamada el distrito D. las flores y localizÃ¡ndose a 5 minutos D. L. plaza D. armas D. L. capital arqueolÃ³gica D. AmÃ©rica del Sur (Cusco). Cusco es una ciudad encantadora que se remonta a los tiempos D. los Incas, L. ciudad del Cusco estÃ¡ construida en L. base D. L. antigua ciudadeL. Inca.
Carlos tiene un pequeÃ±o taller D. automotriz donD. brinda servicios D. mantenimiento D. carros, Ã©l en sus horas libres se dedica a brindar servicios D. transporte pÃºblicos en su propio taxi. Hace varios aÃ±os que se dedica a brindar servicios D. transportes y le va regular. Con su prÃ³ximo prÃ©stamo, Carlos que espera recibir S/.800 nuevos soles es para comprar materiales para el taller como por ejemplo aceites D. carros, lubricantes, etc.
Carlos pertenece al banco comunal â€œNueva Esperanzaâ€ D. L. AsociaciÃ³n Arariwa. El banco comunal esta en el segundo aÃ±o D. funcionamiento y estÃ¡ bien administrado por L. junta directiva.
texts.en:
Carlos lives with his partner and two children in Wanchaq district. Wanchaq district is located in Cusco province, in Cusco department. It is called "The Flower District" and is located 5 minutes from the Plaza D. Armas, in the archaeological capital of South America (Cusco). Cusco is an enchanting city which dates back to Inca times. The city of Cusco is built on the site of the ancient Incan citadel.
Carlos has a small auto repair shop where he provides a car repair service. In his free time he provides public transport services in his own taxi. He has been providing public transport services for several years and his business is doing ok. He hopes to receive a loan for 800 Peruvian soles to buy materials for his auto repair shop such as, for example, car oil, lubricants, etc.
Carlos is a member of AsociaciÃ³n Arariwa's "Nueva Esperanza" (New Hope) community bank which is in its second year and well run by a board of directors.

loan.use: To buy materials for his auto repair shop such as car oil, lubricants, etc.

loan.name: Bacilio

texts.es: Bacilio, de 52 aÃ±os, convive con Bertha, de 46 aÃ±os. Ambos tienen un hijo, Antony, de 8 aÃ±os de edad. En uniÃ³n familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserÃ­o de Cumutay. La principal actividad de Bacilio, es la agricultura, los que hacen 20 aÃ±os siembra, fertiliza y cuida con mucho esmero, pues sus sembrÃ­os de papa, arveja, y maÃ­z, son los mejores de su localidad. Pero no solo a ello se dedica estÃ© exitoso hombre, Ã©l tambiÃ©n se dedica al cuidado de sus animales vacuno y ovino, como tambiÃ©n de los burros, que le ayudan a trasportar el abono o tambiÃ©n los productos que cosecha, en el que son luego distribuidos en la ciudad de Tarma y Huasahuasi, asÃ­ como tambiÃ©n los lleva a la ciudad de Lima. Ahora piensa sembrar arveja en menor proporciÃ³n, complementando con la fortificaciÃ³n de sus sembrÃ­os de papa, los cuales darÃ¡n un buen fruto. Es el sÃ©ptimo crÃ©dito con MFP, y como socio antiguo de su banco comunal, se siente agradecido por todo el apoyo que reciben de parte de sus integrantes. De obtener el crÃ©dito solicitado, podrÃ¡ comprar un saco de semillas de arveja, y varios sacos de abono orgÃ¡nico.
texts.en:
Bacilio is 52 years old and lives with his common-law wife, 46 year-old Bertha. They have one son, Antony, who is 8 years old. They live together as a family in their own home which is located in the village of Cumutay.
Bacilio's main business activity is farming. He has been growing, fertilizing and carefully looking after crops for 20 years. His potato, pea and corn crops are the best in his area. However, this successful man does not only grow crops, he also cares for his cows, sheep and also donkeys who transport manure and also the products that he harvests. He distributes his crops in the cities of Tarma and Huasahuasi. He also takes them to the city of Lima.
Bacilio is thinking of growing fewer peas and strengthening his potato crops which will provide good results. This is his seventh loan with MFP and, as a long-standing member of his community bank, he feels grateful for all the support that he receives from the other members. He will use his loan to buy a sack of pea seeds and several sacks of organic manure.

loan.use: To buy a sack of pea seeds and several sacks of organic manure

loan.name: La Realeza Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama LA REALEZA. EstÃ¡ ubicado en el Estado de Puebla en MÃ©xico. El grupo estÃ¡ conformado por 9 integrantes.
Anselma S.C.Tiene 42 (aÃ±os), estudiÃ³ hasta la primaria, es repostera y tiene en total 2 hijos: 1 mujer y 1 varÃ³n. Ella se dedica a la elaboraciÃ³n de postres que iniciÃ³ hace 13 aÃ±os. Solicita el prÃ©stamo para comprar materia prima y satisfacer los pedidos de sus clientes, los vecinos comentan que estÃ¡n complacidos en la compra de postres, en especial los flanes y las gelatinas que son muy ricos, la preferencia de clientes es por la atenciÃ³n, limpieza y el buen sabor de los postres. Ella vende en su comunidad y en las comunidades aledaÃ±as. Al momento de solicitar este prÃ©stamo se siente contenta. Quiere este crÃ©dito para comprar lo necesario en azÃºcar huevo y saborizantes para cumplir con los pedidos que le han hecho para dÃ­a de R.. TambiÃ©n espera con sus ganancia poder comprar un triciclo para andar en el por toda la comunidad y hacer llegar mÃ¡s rÃ¡pido sus pedidos. Ella anhela darles una vida y educaciÃ³n digna a sus hijos y seguir siendo el mejor ejemplo de lucha para salir a delante.
texts.en:
This group is called LA REALEZA (The Royal Family). It is located in the State of Puebla, in Mexico and has 9 members.
Anselma S.C. is 42 years old. She studied at elementary school level and has 2 children: 1 girl and 1 boy. Her business is making desserts and she started it 13 years ago. She is requesting this loan to buy raw materials so that she can fill her customers' orders. Her neighbors comment that they like buying Anselma's desserts, in particular her creme caramels and gelatin desserts which are delicious. Her customers are loyal to her business because she provides good customer service, cleanliness and good-tasting desserts.
Anselma makes her sales in her own community and in neighboring communities. As she requests this loan, she feels happy. She would like this loan so that she can buy what she needs to fill the orders that she has for 'Kings Day' (6th January). She would like to buy sugar, eggs and flavorings. She also hopes, with her profits, to be able to buy a three-wheeled vehicle so that she can get around her whole community and make her deliveries more quickly. She would like to provide her children with a decent life and education and to continue being the best example of how you need to work hard to get ahead in life.

loan.use: To make gelatin desserts, creme caramels and desserts in general

loan.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is 33 years old and married. She owns a business that sells different items such as soaps, curry powder, and other items. Her husband works as a businessman. She has been selling these items for 12 years. Her loan will be used to buy more items to sell. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to build a house on the plot of land she bought.

loan.use: To purchase items such as soaps, curry powder, and handbags

loan.name: Kalagi Basooka Kwavula Group-Mityana

texts.en: Obed T. is 32 years old, married, and has seven children. He has been running his produce selling and motorcycle transportation businesses for the last decade in Kalagi-Mityana. He began these businesses out of his own enterprise after he saw the success some of his friends were having in running the same businesses. Obed is a farmer and has been successful in his agricultural business, in that he is able to sell the cash crops he harvests from his gardens. Obed says he sees further success if he maintains his tenacity and focus. He earns 150,000 shillings a week from both businesses. Obed belongs to Kalagi Basooka Kwavula Group-Mityana. With this loan, he is going to improve his farming gardens with high grade manure.

loan.use: To purchase high grade manure for his gardens

loan.name: Vicent

texts.en:
Vicent owns a restaurant. He is 36 years old and single. He has been running his restaurant for 10 years.
His loan will be used to establish another restaurant. He hopes to use the new profits from this business for savings and for his own wedding.

loan.use: To buy more food to sell

loan.name: Maribel

texts.es: Maribel, es una exitosa mujer joven y trabajadora de 23 aÃ±os, que vive en casa de sus padres; junto a su esposo Jaime, de 26 aÃ±os y su hijo menor Yosmel, de 3 aÃ±os. En uniÃ³n familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserÃ­o de Cumutay. La actividad principal de Maribel es la agricultura, donde sus principales sembrÃ­os constan de papa, arvejas, y demÃ¡s productos oriundos de la sierra peruana. Los cuales siembra hace ya 4 aÃ±os, y segÃºn afirma con el esfuerzo diario, y los constantes cuidados que le brinda en compaÃ±Ã­a de su esposo, podrÃ¡ obtener muchas ganancias, y con ello invertir en la compra de mÃ¡s terrenos agrÃ­colas. Ya estÃ¡ dando el primer paso, con la adquisiciÃ³n de un espacio en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma, donde podrÃ¡ obtener mejores ganancias, ya que estÃ¡ en un lugar estable. Pero no solo a eso se dedica Maribel, pues en sus tiempos libres, ella prepara biscochuelos y panes. Lo que mÃ¡s le gusta a ella es â€œestar activa y lograr sus objetivosâ€.Es el segundo crÃ©dito con MFP, y como socia de su banco comunal, se compromete en participar de manera activa y responsablemente. De obtener el crÃ©dito solicitado, estÃ¡ pensando invertir en la compra de mÃ¡s sacos de abono para esparcirlos en sus diferentes cultivos.
texts.en:
Maribel is a successful and hard-working young woman of 23. She lives in her parents' home together with her husband, 26 year-old Jaime, and her 3 year-old daughter Yosmel. They live in their own home which is located in the village of Cumutay.
Maribel is in the farming business. Her main crops are potatoes, peas and other products that are native to the Peruvian mountains. She has been growing crops for 4 years and she says that her daily hard work and the constant attention that she gives to her crops, with her husband's help, will make a lot of profits. She will use these profits to invest in buying more farmland. She is taking her first step by acquiring a space in the wholesale market in the city of Tarma where she will be able to obtain better profits since it is in a stable place. However, Maribel doesn't just grow crops. In her spare time she also bakes sponge cakes and bread. What she most enjoys is "being active and achieving goals".
This is Maribel's second loan with MFP and, as a member of her community bank, she pledges to take part in an active and responsible manner. She plans to invest her loan in buying more sacks of manure to spread over her different crops.

loan.use: To buy sacks of organic manure

loan.name: Residenciales Del Campo NÂº 3 Group

texts.es:
Santos Blacina tiene 51 aÃ±os de edad, es casada, tiene cuatro hijos, y es integrante del Grupo Solidario Residenciales El Campo NÂº 2.
Santos se dedica a la venta de productos cosmeticos, ella decidio inscribirse al programa de venta por catalogo de Avon y como trabaja en una farmacia en sus tiempos libres hace visitas domiciliarias y va enseÃ±ando los productos en los catalogos y cuando no cuenta con mucho tiempo los deja y luego regresa. Una de sus dificultades es que da credito y algunas veces sus clientes le quedan mal con la fecha de pago. El prestamo lo necesita para comprar mas y variados productos. Los prestamos obtenidos le han ayudado a obtener su casa porque antes no tenia y ahora la esta mejorando. Unas de sus dificultades es que vende de forma ambulante y cuando le pagan ella tiene que movilizarse con dinero en efectivo y la han asaltado varias veces. Su meta es trabajar muy duro cada dia para tener un negocio en un local y terminar su vivienda. Ha sido clienta de FAMA por 21 ciclos y ha demostrado alta responsabilidad en sus pagos.
texts.en:
Santos Blacina is 51 years old, married, and has four children. She is a member of the Residenciales El Campo No. 3 solidarity group.
Santos' business is selling cosmetics. She decided to sign up to sell Avon products through a ctalog and, as she works in a pharmacy and makes home visits in her spare time, she also shows customers the products in her catalogs. When she doesn't have much time she leaves them and then returns for them later.
One of the problems Santos has in her business is that she provides her goods on credit and sometimes her customers don't pay on time. She needs this loan to buy more products and a better variety of products. The loans she has had so far have helped her to obtain a house which she didn't have before and she is now making improvements to it. Another difficulty that Santos has is that she makes her sales from door to door and when her customers pay her she has to move about with cash on her. She has been assaulted on a couple of occasions. Santos' goal is to work very hard every day so that she can have premises for her business and finish her home. She has been a client of FAMA for 21 loan cycles and she has always shown herself to be very responsible in her payments.

loan.use: To buy a variety of cosmetics

loan.name: Cosmos Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Cosmos estÃ¡ integrado por 9 clientas, en Ã©l se encuentra L. seÃ±ora Mariana N.. Tiene 30 aÃ±os, estudiÃ³ hasta L. secundaria, y es comerciante, venD. zapatos por catÃ¡logo. ElL. tiene 2 hijos, L. sra nos platica que iniciÃ³ su negocio hace 2 aÃ±os debido a L. situaciÃ³n econÃ³mica y a que uno D. sus hijos requerÃ­a tratamiento mÃ©dico. Con el prestamo quiere surtir mercancÃ­a dado que incrementÃ³ sus pedidos. En este mismo grupo se encuentra L. seÃ±ora Rosa Maria V. D. 40 aÃ±os, estudiÃ³ L. primaria, es comerciante y tuvo 7 hijos. L. Sra siempre ha trabajado vendiendo diversos productos ropa y productos D. temporada, nos platica que lleva 16 aÃ±os con el negocio ya que debido a que L. familia era numerosa, L. sra Rosa se viÃ³ en L. necesidad D. apoyar en el gasto familiar. L. Sra. Mariana viÃ³ que los pedidos iban en ascenso y solicitÃ³ el crÃ©dito para invertir en L. compra D. ropa D. temporada.
texts.en:
This group is called Cosmos and has 9 members.
Mariana N. is one of the group's members. She is 30 years old and studied up to high school level. She is a saleswoman and sells shoes through a catalog. She has two children. Mariana tells us that she started her business 2 years ago because of her economic situation and because one of her children needed medical treatment. Mariana would like to use her loan to stock up with merchandise as her orders have increased.
Rosa Maria VÃ¡zquez is another member of this group. She is 40 years old, studied to elementary school level, is a saleswoman and has 7 children. She has always worked selling different products such as clothes and seasonal products. She tells us that she has been in this business for 16 years since, as she has a large family, Rosa has to support her family's expenses. She saw that her orders were increasing and requested this loan so that she could invest in buying seasonal clothes.

loan.use: To invest in buying merchandise

loan.name: Gloria

texts.es: La Sra. Gloria es una persona muy seria y respetuosa ella solicita el prÃ©stamo por que quiere comprar mas mercancÃ­a para su tienda de abarrotes ya que donde ella tiene su negocio es casi en la salida de piedras negras a ella le gustarÃ­a surtir mas su tienda de abarrotes para asÃ­ poder brindarle mas variedad a su clientela, el negocio lo manejan entre los dos su esposo y la Sra. gloria, ella desea poner en un futuro un negocio de comida.
texts.en: Gloria is a very serious and respectful person. She is requesting this loan as she would like to buy more merchandise for her grocery store. Her business is located almost at the exit of Piedras Negras. She would like to better stock her grocery stock so that she can provide her customers with more variety. She and her husband run the business. In the future, Gloria would like to set up a food business.

loan.use: To buy merchandise

loan.name: Sarita Colonia Group

texts.es: NoemÃ­ Maura, es casada, tiene 54 aÃ±os de edad, y tiene 3 hijos ya mayores de edad. Actualmente es la tesorera del grupo â€œSARITA COLONIAâ€, el cual ya lleva cuatro aÃ±os de formaciÃ³n y se encuentra integrado por 10 socias que residen en la zona de Comas. Desde hace 2 aÃ±os la Sra. NoemÃ­ se dedica a la venta de productos de necesidad en su bodega. Se inicia en este negocio vendiendo golosinas como ambulante, asÃ­ es como NoemÃ­ decide poner este negocio y es asÃ­ como inicia una fuente de ingresos para su hogar, permitiÃ©ndole mejorarar su calidad de vida y la de sus hijos y crecer gracias a la dedicaciÃ³n que le brinda a su pequeÃ±o negocio. Con su trabajo ha logrado incrementar su mercaderÃ­a para ofrecer a sus clientes mayor variedad, permitiÃ©ndole ahorrar e invertir mucho mas. El prÃ©stamo solicitado lo invertirÃ¡ en su negocio (compra de mercaderÃ­a y panetones para esta campaÃ±a navideÃ±a).
texts.en:
NoemÃ­ Maura is married, is 54 years old, and has three adult children.
She is the treasure of the group called â€œSARITA COLONIA,â€ which was formed four years ago and made up of 10 members who live in the Comas zone.
NoemÃ­ has been selling personal products in her shop for the past two years. She started this business by selling snacks on foot and this lead to this business and a source of household income. This allowed her to improve her and her childrenâ€™s quality of life, thanks to the dedication she gives her small business.
Her work has allowed her to increase her inventory, allowing her to offer her customers a larger variety of items, and to save and invest much more. She will use the money from this loan to invest into her business (merchandise and pants for this Christmas season).

loan.use: Inventory

loan.name: Carmen Graciela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal â€œPADRE ETERNOâ€; Este banco estÃ¡ ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra: Carmen; La socia tiene 38 aÃ±os de edad, es soltero y tiene 1 hijos; la socia trabaja en la cooperativa de ahorro y crÃ©dito Santo Domingo de GuzmÃ¡n, ella es contadora y pertenece al banco comunal desde hace 6 aÃ±os, le gusta la modalidad del grupo en cuanto al ahorro y es un grupo muy cumplido y son amigos desde hace muchos aÃ±os, ellos tambiÃ©n hacen actividades en grupo y lo que reÃºnen lo ahorran hasta fin de aÃ±o cuando pueden repartirse sus ahorros y tener una buena navidad, la socia ahora requiere el prÃ©stamo para comprar algo personal ella indica que desea comprarse una casaca y con las fiestas navideÃ±as dio regalos a todos y ella no pudo comprarse nada y que ahora desea hacerlo e ir pagando de a pocos. La socia solicita el prÃ©stamo para uso personal.
La socia estÃ¡ feliz con el prÃ©stamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: The member belongs to the "Padre Eterno" ["Eternal Father"] community bank. The bank is located in the Huanchac district in the province and department of Cusco. The member is Mrs. Carmen. She is 38, single, and has one child. She works in the Santo Domingo de Guzman savings and lending cooperative. She is an accountant and has belonged to the community bank for 6 years. She likes the group's saving methods, and it is a very punctual group. They have been friends for many years. They also do group work and they save what they make until the end of the year when they can divide out their savings and have a good Christmas. Carmen now requires a loan to purchase some personal items. She says that she wants to buy a jacket, and gifts for everyone for the upcoming Christmas holidays. She could not buy anything and she now wants to take the loan and pay bit by bit. She is requesting this loan for personal use. She is happy to have this loan and promises to pay the quotas as established.

loan.use: The member is requesting this loan for personal use.

loan.name: Victor Enrique

texts.es:
Victor de 58 aÃ±os, es un hombre trabajador que siempre le ha gustado tener su propio dinero por eso que hace 6 aÃ±os comenzÃ³ con su negocio de la papelerÃ­a para asÃ­ ayudar a su familia a mantener su hogar.
Viviendo en una zona urbana llamada Guasmo ahora trabaja en su propio negocio desde las 07h00am hasta las 22h00pm atendiendo a los clientes. Vende en su papelerÃ­a plumas, juguetes, cuadernos, accesorios etc. Aunque uno de los problemas que tiene es la delincuencia que hay en el sector por donde vive sigue trabajando para poder asegurar su vejez.
Con el prÃ©stamo quiere comprar juguetes y cuadernos para su negocio para que sus clientes tengan mÃ¡s variedad al comprar. En el futuro quiere agrandar el negocio y tener mas clientes.
texts.en:
Victor is 58 years old. He is a hard-working man who has always liked having his own money. For this reason, 6 years ago he started his stationery business so that he could help his family and support his household.
Victor lives in an urban area called Guasmo. He works in his own business from 7.00am to 10.00pm, serving his customers. In his stationery store he sells pens, toys, exercise books, accessories, etc. Although he faces problems with the crime in his area, he continues working so that he can guarantee his old age.
Victor would like to use his loan to buy toys and exercise books for his business so that his customers have more variety when they come to make their purchases. In the future, he would like to expand his business and have more customers.

loan.use: To buy toys and exercise books

loan.name: Maritza Del Pilar

texts.en:
Maritza Del Pilar is a 48 year old, single entrepreneur. When she was a little girl she learned how to make clothes. She has been designing and making clothes for more than 10 years now. She also sells sodas and juices at her store. Maritza has two children who are both married. Her daughter, who lives close by, helps making clothes and selling drinks at her store.
Maritza lives in an area in the south of Guayaquil, called Isla Trinitaria. This area is known for its lawlessness and its scant basic services. Luckily Maritza's home is made of cement and has electricity and water. Due to unsafe conditions in the area, it is sometimes too dangerous in the street, forcing Maritza to close her store early.
Maritza will use the loan to buy material needed to make and repair clothes and to buy drinks to sell in her store. In the future Martiza hopes to open a small store and to fix the top floor of her house. She would also like to have a place to design high quality clothes.

loan.use: To buy materials to make clothes and to buy drinks to sell

loan.name: Ramila

texts.ru: Ramila A. 46 let. Ona zamujem i imeyet 2 detey kotoriye uchatsya v kolledje. Ramila yeyo muj i deti jivut v qorode Baku. Uje 5 let kak Ramila zanimayetsya etim biznessom prodaji pishevix produktov. Seychas ona nujdayetsay v 2000 AZN chtobi uvelichit pomesheniye dlya toqo chtobi pomestit bolshe produktov dlya prodaji.
texts.en:
Ramila A. is 46 years old. She is married and has two children, who are college student. Ramila lives with her husband and children in the city of Baku.
For the last five years, Ramila has been in business selling groceries. At present she needs 2000 AZN in order to expand her store space and be able to accommodate more wares.

loan.use: Expanding her store

loan.name: Duo Getzemani Group

texts.es:
duo GETZEMANI
LUCIA V. P. . tiene 55 aÃ±os de edad tiene tres hijos, ella se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde, desde hace dos aÃ±os, ella necesita su credito para pode comprar mas pollitos, porque ya estan bastante grandes los que tiene, ya estan para destazarlos y por eso necesita su credito.para la polleria
TORIBIA HERNANDEZ C.. tiene 40 aÃ±os de edad tiene 4 hijos pequeÃ±os, se dedica a la crianza de pollos tiene pollos de engorde y tambien pollos de pais, ella necesita su credito para poder obtener mas pollitos para poder criarlos y obtener mejores ventas y mejores ganancias, para el sustento de su familiA
texts.en:
The members of "Duo Getzemani" are:
LUCIA V. P.. She is 55 years old and has three children. Her work is raising chicks and fattening them up for sale. She has done this work for two years. She needs this loan to buy more chicks, because the chickens she has are quite big and ready to butcher. For this reason, she needs a loan for her poultry business.
TORIBIA HERNANDEZ C.. She is 40 years old and has 4 young children. Her work is raising chickens. She has chicks that she buys to fatten up and also locally raised chickens. She needs the loan so that she can buy more chicks to raise, in order to achieve better sales and higher earnings to support her family.

loan.use: Buying chicks to raise and sell

loan.name: Sakhavat

texts.ru:
Sakhavat A. 28 let. On ne jenat. Sakhavat yavlyayetsya IDP personom on pereselenec iz Fuzuli qoroda, seychas projivayet v qorode Baku vmeste so svoimi roditelyami.
Sakhavat uje 5 let kak rabotayet masterom domov , etomu biznessu on nauchilsya u svoyeqo otca kotoriy toje bil masterom. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit instrumenti dlya svoyey raboti.
texts.en:
Sakhat A. is 28 years old. He is single. Sakhava is an Internally Displaced Person. He moved from the town of Fuzuli and currently lives in Baku together with his parents.
For the five last years, Sakhavat has been working as a construction foreman. He learned this trade from his father, who also used to be a foreman. At present he needs 2000 AZN in order to buy necessary tools for his work.

loan.use: Purchasing necessary tools

loan.name: Margaritas De Tlatelulco Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama MARGARITAS DE TLATELULCO se encuentra ubicado en Toluca, Estado de MÃ©xico. EstÃ¡ conformado por 11 integrantes, entre ellas estÃ¡ la Sra MarÃ­a de Jesus quien tiene 28 aÃ±os de edad y 3 hijos: 2 mujeres y 1 hombre, todos estudiando. Ella se dedica a vender pan desde hace 8 aÃ±os, comenta que decidiÃ³ iniciar su negocio porque los ingresos de su esposo muchas veces no le alcanzaban para cubrir sus necesidades y las de sus hijos. Su deseo de ella es algÃºn dia poner un local para vender su pan, tener por lo menos 2 empleadas de su misma comunidad y darles estudios a sus hijos, ya que ella no pudo terminar ni la primaria.
texts.en: This group is called MARGARITAS DE TLATELULCO. It is located in Toluca, in the State of MÃ©xico. It is made up of 11 members. Among them is MarÃ­a de Jesus, who is 28 years old and has 3 children, 2 girls and one boy, all of whom are in school. She has worked selling bread for the past 8 years. She comments that she decided to start her business because her husband's income was often not enough to cover their needs and those of their children. Her desire is to open a shop one day where she can sell her bread, to have at least 2 employees from the community where she lives, and be able to pay for her children's studies, since she herself was not even able to finish primary school.

loan.use: Buying supplies for her business

loan.name: Jose Ramon

texts.es:
Jose de 67 aÃ±os, comenzÃ³ a ser guardia de carros para poder mantener a su familia ya que la falta de oportunidades no le permitÃ­a darles las comodidades a ellos.
Viviendo en una zona periurbana llamada Perimetral ha trabajado cuando autos de otras personas desde las 18h00pm hasta las amanecer. Antes tenÃ­a una moto que la convirtiÃ³ en tricimoto (es una moto combinada con asientos para llevar pasajeros). Tiene muchas aspiraciones y superaciones para el futuro por eso quiere continuar con esfuerzo y utilizar el prÃ©stamo para arreglar la moto y vender bebidas.
En el futuro tiene muchas aspiraciones por eso quiere seguir con salud y que el trasporte de la moto siga para seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Jose, age 67, started working as a car guard in order to support his family. The lack of opportunities did not allow him to provide his family with comforts.
He lives in the periurban zone called Perimetral. He has been working by guarding other peopleâ€™s cars from 6:00 p.m. until dawn. Previously, he had a motorcycle, which he converted in a â€œtricimotoâ€ (a motorcycle combined with seats for transporting passengers).
He has a great ambition and desire to succeed in the future. That is why he wants to continue working hard. He will use the loan to fix up the motorcycle and to sell drinks.
In the future he has a lot of aspirations. Therefore, he wants to continue in good health. He also wants to continue using his motorcycle for transportation in order to keep working.

loan.use: Fix his motorcycle and drinks

loan.name: Solidario Las Sumpangueras Group

texts.es: LAS SUMPANGUERAS Las integrantes del grupo viven aproximadamente a 32 km de la ciudad la representante de este grupo quien es Narcisa es una seÃ±ora muy trabajadora ya que ella le ha dado el ejemplo a las hijas a trabajar arduamente, todas se dedican a la venta de tamales los fines de semana, doÃ±a Narcisa Cuenta que los sÃ¡bados preparan aproximadamente 500 tamales que son vendidos en el mercado por doÃ±a Maria Tomasa y Lorenza Estela que tambiÃ©n son integrantes del grupo. Las tres han trabajado con Fape por mucho tiempo y han sido muy cumplidas por lo que ahora solicitan otro crÃ©dito mas ya que se aproximan las fiestas navideÃ±as y necesitan comprar ingredientes para elavorar tamales ya que los pedidos se multiplican para esta temporada, ellas desean sacarle provecho para poder asÃ­ darles una mejor vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The Sumpangueras
The members of the group live approximately 32 kilometers from the city. Narcisa is the representative of this group. She is a very hard-working woman, and she has given her daughters the example of working arduously. All of them sell tamales on the week-end.
Narcisa says that on Saturdays she prepares approximately 500 tamales. Maria Tomasa and Loreza Estela, also members of the group, sell the tamales at the market.
The three of them have worked with Fape for a long time, and they are very dependable. They are now requesting another loan because the Christmas fiestas are approaching. They need to buy ingredients to make the tamales. The orders have increased for this season. They want to take advantage of the demand in order to be able to improve their childrenâ€™s lives.

loan.use: To buy ingredients to make tamales

loan.name: RisueÃ±as De Atenco Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama RisueÃ±as de Atenco estÃ¡ integrado por 12 clientas, en Ã©l se encuentra la seÃ±ora Ma De Los Remedios quien tiene 30 aÃ±os, estudiÃ³ hasta la secundaria, es comerciante fabrica caja para el zapato. Ella tiene 2 hijos, la sra nos platica que iniciÃ³ su negocio hace 12 aÃ±os en un local pequeÃ±ito de una medida de 1X1.5mt todo lo hacian manual ya que a la semana hacian entre 150 a 200 cajas como a los 2 aÃ±os les vendieron unos aparatos para facilitar el proceso de la caja, hoy en dia realizan entre 1000 a 1300 cajas por semana lo cual es un ingreso que les da para vivir y poder darle a sus hijos lo necesario para que el dia de maÃ±ana sean unos profesionistas.
texts.en:
The group is called â€œRisueÃ±as de Atencoâ€ (Cheerful people from Atenco). It is comprised of 12 members. Maria de los Remedios is one of the members. She is 30 years old, and she has a middle school education.
She is a merchant, and she makes shoe boxes. She has two children. She tells us that she started her business in a very small place measuring 1 x 1.5 meters. They did everything by hand. They made between 150 and 200 boxes a week. Two years ago they were sold some apparatus to facilitate the process of making the box. Now they make between 1,000 and 1,300 boxes a week.
This income gives them a living, and they are able to give their children what they need in order to become professionals in the future.

loan.use: To buy material to make shoe boxes

loan.name: Elchin

texts.ru:
Elchin G. 45 let. On jenat i imeyet 2 detey odin iz kotorix uchitsya v koledje a druqoy v universitete. Elchin yavlyayestya IDP personom on pereselenec iz Fuzuli qoroda i seychas projivayet v Absheron regione vmeste so svoyey jenoy i detmi.
Elchin uje 8 let kak rabotayet masnikom, etomu biznessu on nauchilsya u svoyeqo dyadi. Seychas on nujdayestya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit myaso dlya pereprodaji.
texts.en:
Elchin G. is 45 years old. He is married, with two children, one of whom is a college student, and the other a university student. Elchin is an Internally Displaced person from the town of Fuzuli, now living in the Absheron Region together with his wife and children.
For the last eight years, Elchin has been working as a butcher. He learned this trade from his uncle. At present he needs 2000 AZN in order to purchase meat products for resale.

loan.use: Purchasing meat for resale

loan.name: Duo Solidario Galilea Group

texts.es:
Duo solidario GALILEA
SONIA CECILIA T. V..
ella tiene 22 aÃ±os de edad es soltera,ella se dedica a la venta de ropa tipica, cortes, blusas, delantales etc. Su negocio lo realiza ambulante, en Su localidad Solicita el cedito para la compra de ropa tipica
CRISTOBAL T. V..
tiene 55 aÃ±os de edad tiene tres hijos, el se dedica a la venta de ropa tipica cortes,delantales,blusas, el vende su producto en su localidad tambien tiene un su terreno en donde cultiva cafÃ©, su credito lo necesita para poder surtir su mercaderia, en compra de ropa tipica , porque en esta epoca hay venta de su producto.
texts.en:
'Galilea' Solidarity Group
Sonia Cecilia T. V. is 22 years old, single, and sells traditional clothes, skirts, blouses, aprons, etc. She carries out her business as an itinerant street vendor in her area. She is requesting this loan to buy traditional clothes.
Cristobal T. V. is 55 years old and has three children. He sells traditional clothes, skirts, aprons and blouses. He sells his products in his area. He also has a plot of land where he grows coffee. He needs a loan so that he can stock his business with merchandise, buying traditional clothes, because he sells a lot of his products in this season.

loan.use: Traditional clothes

loan.name: Mireye Marisol

texts.es:
Mireye de 36 aÃ±os, es una mujer trabajadora que gracias a su esposo hace algunos aÃ±os comenzÃ³ a vender chifles de plÃ¡tanos. Con su esposo tienen tres hijos de 15, 9 y 9 meses.
Viviendo en una zona periurbana llamada Perimetral aprendiÃ³ hacer chifles y ubico una pequeÃ±a tienda para general ingresos suficientes y ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos familiares de sus tres hijos. En la actualidad trabaja con ayuda de su esposo en su pequeÃ±a tienda- papelerÃ­a. Vende cuadernos, ropa, chifles, accesorios de papelerÃ­a etc.
Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso lo quiere surtir su tienda comprando con el prÃ©stamo ropa, papelerÃ­a, artÃ­culos etc. En el futuro quiere incrementar la papelerÃ­a con mÃ¡s artÃ­culos y mercaderÃ­a nueva para sus clientes.
texts.en:
Mireye is a hardworking woman who is 36 years old. Thanks to her husband, she was able to start selling plantain chips a few years ago. She and her husband have three children who are fifteen years old, nine years old, and nine months old.
She learned how to make chips while living just outside the city in an area called Perimetral. She opened a small store which allows her to generate sufficient income and help her husband with household expenses for their three children. Currently, she helps her husband with his small stationary business. They sell notebooks, clothing, chips, and paper goods etc.
She has many aspirations for their business. This is why she wants to use the loan to stock their store with clothing, stationary and other goods etc. In the future, she would like to expand the stationary store, adding more goods and new merchandise for their customers.

loan.use: Clothing and stationary

loan.name: Denia Maria

texts.es: Denia Maria M. A. tiene 33 aÃ±os de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijos, y reside en la comunidad de La Villa en el departamento de Francisco Morazan. Desde hace cuatro aÃ±os Denia se dedica a la venta de ropa para vestir y ropa interior en su domicilio y de forma ambulante en las comunidades mas cercanas. Trabaja de lunes a domingo cuando la temporada es buena y cuando inicia los periodos de la cosecha de la hoja de puros. El prestamo lo necesita para surtir su negocio de ropa para mujer y hombres y que sea variada y a la moda, ya que esto le permitira aumentar sus ventas y ahorrar un poco para cuando la temporada sea baja. Una de sus dificultades es que que da al credito y algunos clientes le quedan mal con el pago. Su meta es sacar adelante a sus hijos ya que estan estudiando y quiere que tengan un futuro mejor que el de ella. Es su primer ciclo en FAMA.
texts.en:
Denia Maria M. A. is a 33-year-old single mother of two. She lives in a community called La Villa in the department of Francisco Morazan. Four years ago, Denia began selling underwear and other clothes out of her home and on trips to neighboring communities. She works from Monday to Sunday during the busy season and at the start of the cigar leaf harvest.
She needs the loan in order to stock her store with varied and stylish clothing for women and men. This will allow her to increase sales and save up a little for the slow season. One problem she faces is that she allows her customers to defer payment and some of them don't pay her back. Her goal is to help her children to succeed. They are in school now and she hopes that they will have a better life than she has had. This is her first loan cycle with FAMA.

loan.use: Purchase of new clothing

loan.name: Mammadaga

texts.ru: Mammadaga R. 26 let. On jenat i imeyet odnoqo rebonka. On jivet v qorode Baku vmeste so svoyey jenoy i rebonkom. Mammadaga uje 2 qoda kak zanimayetsya etim biznessom prodaji serebrennix uksrasheniy. Etomu biznessu on nauchilsya u svoyeqo druqa. Seychas Mammadaga nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi rasshirit pomesheniye i kupit yeshe vetrinnix polok dlya prodaji tovara.
texts.en: Mammadaga R. is 26 years old. He is married and has one child. He lives in the city of Baku with his wife and child. For the last two years, Mammadaga has been in the silver jewelry business. He learned this business from a friend. At present Mammadaga needs 2000 AZN in order to enlarge his store facility and to purchase additional display cases for his goods.

loan.use: Enlarging his store facility

loan.name: Rocio

texts.es: RocÃ­o es socia del Banco Comunal BelÃ©n, tiene 24 aÃ±os de edad, trabaja en un taller de confecciones, los prÃ©stamos que ha recibido los ha utilizado para comprar hilo, agujas, tijeras y tela. En esta Ã©poca el negocio es bajo debido a que el aÃ±o escolar terminÃ³ recientemente y gran parte de su negocio proviene de confecciÃ³n de uniformes escolares. RocÃ­o es socia de FINCA PerÃº desde hace mas de un aÃ±o y ha sido presidenta de su Banco Comunal BelÃ©n. Lo que mÃ¡s le gusta de trabajar con FINCA PerÃº son las capacitaciones que recibe sobre cÃ³mo mejorar su negocio. Su sueÃ±o es ampliar su negocio, comprar mÃ¡s mÃ¡quinas de coser, actualmente sÃ³lo tiene uno.
texts.en:
RocÃ­o is a member of the BelÃ©n (Bethlehem) community bank. She is 24 years old and works in a dressmaking workshop. She has used previous loans to buy thread, needles, scissors and fabric. During this season her business is slow as the school year recently ended and a large part of her business comes from making school uniforms.
RocÃ­o has been a member of FINCA PerÃº for more than a year and she has been president of her community bank. What she most likes about working with FINCA PerÃº are the training sessions that she attends on how to improve her business. Her dream is to expand her business and buy more sewing machines. She currently only has one.

loan.use: To buy a sewing machine

loan.name: Alex Franklin

texts.es: Alex Franklin M. A. tiene 35 aÃ±os de edad, es casado, tiene tres hijos, y junto a su familia reside en la comunidad de La Villa en Francisco Morazan. Alex empezo con la cria de ganado desde hace tres aÃ±os y su padre le enseÃ±o a trabajar. Dos veces a la semana Ã¨l destaza dos vacas y vende la carne a compradores que tienen carnicerias. El prestamo lo necesita para comprar 3 novillos y asi incrementar su inventario de ganado. Con el apoyo de este prestamo podra ofrecer a sus clientes mas carnes. Su desafio es mantener su ganado sano y seguro porque es lo que le permite sostener economicamente. Su meta es convertirse en el mayor ganadero de su comunidad y asi poder darle una mejor condicion de vida a su esposa e hijos. Es su primer ciclo en FAMA.
texts.en: Alex Franklin M. A. is 35 years old. He is married and has three children. He lives with his family in the community of La Villa en Francisco Morazan. Alex began to raise livestock three years ago, and his father taught him how to do the work. Twice a week he slaughters two cows and sells the meat to buyers who have butcher's shops. He needs the loan to buy three young bulls and thus increase his herd. With the help of this loan, he will be able to offer his customers more meat. His challenge is to keep his livestock healthy and safe, because this is what allows him to maintain himself economically. His goal is to become the biggest cattle owner in his community and thus be able to give his wife and children better living conditions. This is his first loan with FAMA.

loan.use: Buy cattle

loan.name: Solidario Josue 1-9 Group

texts.es: Solidario Josue 1-9 Las hermanas Q. S.. Las tres son madres de niÃ±os que estudian en distintos lugares, La mayor de ellas quien es anilda se dedica al venta de verduras al igual que Herlinda, Silvia se dedica a la venta de desinfectantes para pisos asÃ­ como tambiÃ©n para la cocina, ellas han trabajado durante varios aÃ±os con Fape por lo que solicitan otro crÃ©dito para la compra de frutas, verduras y desinfectantes ya que en el lugar donde vende Anilda les da la oportunidad de vender, las tres han sido muy cumplidas en el tiempo que llevan con fape por lo que estarÃ­an muy agradecidas si les llegara a autorizar un crÃ©dito ya que el deseo de ella es que tengan mÃ¡s ganancias ya que viene el ciclo escolar y los niÃ±os necesitan de mas materiales para estudiar.
texts.en: The "Solidario Josue 1-9" [Solidarity Joshua 1:9] group is made up of the Q. S. sisters. All three are the mothers of children who study at different schools. The oldest, Anilda, works selling vegetables, as does Herlinda. Silvia works selling disinfectants for floors and also for the kitchen. They have worked with FAPE for several years, and they are requesting another loan to buy vegetables and disinfectants, since the place where Anilda sells her products is giving them the opportunity to sell goods during this season. All three have been very dependable during the time they have worked with FAPE. They will be very grateful if they are granted a loan; their desire is to increase their earnings, since a new school term is starting and the children need more supplies for their studies.

loan.use: Buying vegetables wholesale and disinfectants to sell

loan.name: Nudis Consuelo

texts.es:
Nudis de 44 aÃ±os, es una mujer muy hogareÃ±a que le ha gustado trabajar para poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos familiares.
DespuÃ©s de observar que su familia era muy trabajadora supo que la independizarse era la alternativa para que su familia tenga una buena vida. Poco a poco compro papelerÃ­a para una papelerÃ­a y comenzÃ³ a trabajar desde las 07h00am hasta las 20h00pm. Vende a sus vecinos y conocidos la mercaderÃ­a como papeles, cuadernos, plumas, accesorios etc. Uno de los inconvenientes que tiene en el sector donde vive es la delincuencia por eso en la foto refleja la seguridad que ha puesto en el negocio.
Quiere seguir con su negocio por eso quiere el prÃ©stamo para poder comprar papeles, bebidas, cuadernos, laminas. En el futuro quiere prosperar en su negocio y surtir mas la mercaderÃ­a ya que ahora no estÃ¡ muy surtida.
texts.en:
Nudis is 44 years old. She is a very home-loving woman who has enjoyed working to help her husband with their family expenses.
After watching her family who were very hard working, Nudis knew that she wanted to work for herself so that her family could have a good life. She gradually bought stationery items to stock a stationery store and began working from 7.00am to 8.00pm. She sells merchandise such as paper, exercise books, pens, accessories, etc. to her neighbors and acquaintances. One of the problems she faces in her area is crime. This is why the photo reflects the safety measures that she has installed in her business.
Nudis would like to continue in her business and for that reason she would like this loan so that she can buy paper, drinks, exercise books and wall charts. In the future, she would like to prosper in her business and stock it with more merchandise as right now it isn't very well stocked.

loan.use: To buy paper, drinks and exercise books

loan.name: Manuel

texts.es: Manuel, de 38 aÃ±os, convive con Johana, de 36 aÃ±os. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Jomira, de 13 y Mayela, de 8 aÃ±os de edad. En uniÃ³n familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserÃ­o de Cumutay. Todas las maÃ±anas desde muy temprano se dedica al cuidado de sus cultivos, actividad que lo ejercÃ­a desde que tenia 18 aÃ±os; donde siembra papa, arveja y maÃ­z; los que despuÃ©s de cada cosecha los comercializa en el mercado central de Tarma, pero segÃºn afirma en Ã©pocas de campaÃ±a agrÃ­cola, los mismos comerciantes visitan la localidad de Huasahuasi, para negociar su producciÃ³n. Lo que mÃ¡s le gusta a Manuel, es abonar sus cultivos, para que le proporcionen buenos frutos, ya que en tiempos de lluvia necesitan mayores cuidados. Ahora Ã©l desea invertir en la compra de mÃ¡s terrenos agrÃ­colas, ya dio el primer paso, comprando un pequeÃ±o terreno paralelo a de su casa. Es el cuarto crÃ©dito con MFP, y espera obtener buenos logros con el trabajo que estÃ¡ realizando en su banco comunal. De obtener el crÃ©dito estÃ¡ pensando invertir en la compra de 8 kilos de semillas de arvejas, que oscila entre los 30 soles cada una, y con el resto del dinero comprarÃ¡ varios sacos de abono orgÃ¡nico.
texts.en:
Manuel is 38 years old. He lives with his partner Johana who is 36. They have 2 children: 13 year-old Jomira and 8 year-old Mayela. They live together as a family in their own home which is located in the village of Cumutay.
Every morning, at an early hour, Manuel heads out to care for his crops. He has been in this business since he was 18 years old. He grows potatoes, peas and corn which he then harvests and sells in Tarma central market. However, he says that during the farming season, salespeople visit the area of Huasahuasi to negotiate for his crops. What Manuel enjoys most is spreading manure on his crops so that they grow well since, during rainy periods, they require more care.
Manuel would like to invest in buying more farmland. He has already taken the first step, buying a small plot of land parallel to his home. This is his fourth loan with MFP and he hopes to obtain good results through the work that he is carrying out as a member of his community bank. He is planning to invest this loan in buying 8 kilos of pea seeds which cost around 30 Peruvian soles each and he will use the rest of the money to buy several sacks of organic manure.

loan.use: To buy 8 kilos of pea seeds and sacks of organic manure

loan.name: Jorge Adalberto

texts.es: Jorge Adalberto A. C. tiene 31 aÃ±os de edad, es casado, tiene un hijo de un mes, y reside en el Barrio El Kinder en el municipio de Silca, Olancho. Jorge tiene una pequeÃ±a venta de abarroteria, iniciÃ² a trabajar luego que se uniera a su compaÃ±era de hogar, la cual le ayuda a atender la pulperia desde las 7:00 am hasta las 6:00 pm. El prestamo solicitado lo invertira en la compra de azucar, arroz, manteca, jabon, papel higienico, harina, maseca, etc. Con el apoyo de este prestamo podra incrementar el inventario de productos en su pulperia y asi ofrecer mas variedad a sus clientes. Su meta es hacer crecer su negocio y pronto convertirlo en un mini-super y asi poder seguir sosteniendo a su esposa e hijo. Es primer ciclo en FAMA.
texts.en:
Jorge Adalberto A. C. is 31 years old, married, and has a one-month-old child. He lives in El Kinder neighborhood, in the town of Silca, Olancho.
Jorge has a small grocery store. He started working in this business when he got together with his domestic partner. She helps him to serve in the store from 7.00am to 6.00pm.
Jorge will invest his loan in buying sugar, rice, butter, soap, toilet paper, flour, Maseca corn flour, etc. The support of this loan will enable him to increase his product inventory in his grocery store and allow him to offer more choice to his customers. His goal is to grow his business and soon he plans to turn it into a mini-supermarket so that he can continue supporting his partner and child. This is his first loan cycle with FAMA.

loan.use: To buy general groceries

loan.name: Benedicta

texts.es: Benedicta, de 58 aÃ±os, es una valerosa madre soltera de 2 hijos, los cuales viven en diferentes lugares del paÃ­s. Pero ella vive con su papa Honorato, de 83 aÃ±os de edad, en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Cochas. Hace algÃºn tiempo estÃ¡ laboriosa mujer, se dedicaba a la venta de coca, donde comercializaba al por mayor, con la licencia correspondiente, del estado. Ahora ella regresÃ³ a Tarma, para poder cuidar a su papÃ¡ que estÃ¡ delicado de salud; a quien ayuda en sus sembrÃ­os de papa, habas, arveja y maÃ­z, los que cuida con mucho cuidado, porque sabe que de ello depende sus ganancias. En cada cosecha Benedicta, lleva a vender su producciÃ³n a la capital. Pero el mayor pasatiempo de ella, es la crianza de sus 45 cabezas de reses y sus 50 cuyes, los cuales los alimenta para luego vender su carne al por mayor en el mercado central de Tarma. Ahora quiere sembrar en mayores cantidades y cuidar a su papÃ¡. Es el dÃ©cimo crÃ©dito con MFP, y como secretaria de su banco comunal, se siente dichosa de poder pertenecer a una asociaciÃ³n antigua que trabaja para el Ã©xito de sus integrantes. De obtener el crÃ©dito solicitado, podrÃ¡ adquirir varios sacos de semilla de arveja, los cuales esparcirÃ¡ en sus terrenos agrÃ­colas.
texts.en:
58 year-old Benedicta is a courageous single mother. She has two children who live in different parts of the country. Benedicta lives with her dad, 83 year-old Honorato, in their own home which is located in the town of Cochas.
Some time ago, this hard-working woman used to sell coca leaf wholesale, with the corresponding state license. Now she has returned to Tarma so that she can take care of her dad who is not in good health. She helps him with his potato, bean, pea and corn crops, taking good care of them because she knows that their profits depend on it. Each harvest season, Benedicta takes her crops to sell in the capital. However, her biggest pastime is raising her 45 heads of cattle and 50 guinea pigs which she feeds so that she can then sell their meat wholesale in Tarma central market. Benedicta would like to sow her crops in larger quantities and take care of her father.
This is Benedicta's tenth loan with MFP and, as secretary of her community bank, she feels lucky to be able to work for a long-standing association that works for the success of its members. She will use her loan to acquire several sacks of pea seed which she will sow on her land.

loan.use: To buy sacks of pea seed

loan.name: Matha Aurora

texts.es:
Martha de 55 aÃ±os, tiene mucho tiempo fabricando zapatos con ayuda de su familia y vendiÃ©ndolos en un puesto de la bahÃ­a (zona muy comercial donde se ubican comerciantes en locales a vender mercaderÃ­a).
Viviendo en una zona periurbana llamada Perimetral muy cerca del trinipuerto donde descargan los barcos de mercaderÃ­a comenzÃ³ a fabricar los zapatos con su familia hace varios aÃ±os atrÃ¡s para venderlos a la habÃ­a. En la actualidad hace tres docenas de zapatos para vender. Tiene su taller de fabricaciÃ³n de zapatos en su casa ya que se le hace mÃ¡s fÃ¡cil.
Tiene muchas aspiraciones para su negocio por eso quiere continuar comprando con el prÃ©stamo cuero, pegamento, materiales para poder producir mÃ¡s. En el futuro quiere comprar una mÃ¡quina para una buena fabricaciÃ³n de zapatos.
texts.en:
Martha is 55 years old. For a long time she has been making shoes, with the help of her family, and selling them from a stall in La BahÃ­a (an area with a lot of commercial activity where salespeople set up in premises to sell merchandise).
Martha lives in a peri-urban area called Perimetral which is very near the Trinipuerto where cargo ships unload their merchandise. She started making shoes with her family several years ago so that she could sell them in La BahÃ­a. She is currently making three dozen pairs of shoes to sell. She has her shoe workshop in her home since it is easier that way.
Martha has a lot of aspirations for her business. For this reason, she would like to continue in her business, using her loan to buy leather, adhesive and materials so that she can produce more shoes. In the future, she would like to buy a machine so that she can make her shoes even better.

loan.use: To buy leather, adhesive and materials

loan.name: Jakeline Edith

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal â€œPADRE ETERNOâ€; Este banco estÃ¡ ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra: Jakeline; La socia tiene 23 aÃ±os de edad, es soltera; la socia trabaja en la Instituto Nacional de Cultura, la socia paralelamente trabaja vendiendo productos de belleza por catÃ¡logos, ella vende Unique y Avon, son dos diferentes empresas de cosmÃ©ticos, la socia con este paralelo oficio paga sus estudios de English, la socia requiere el prÃ©stamo para ayudarse en la mensualidad de sus clases de English, pagar sus libros y continuar estudiando. La socia solicita el prÃ©stamo para invertir en los pagos de sus estudios de english.
La socia estÃ¡ feliz con el prÃ©stamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "PADRE ETERNO" (Eternal Father) communal bank, which is located in the Huanchac district of the Cusco province and department.
The member is Jakeline, who is 23 years old and single. She works in the National Institute of Culture, and also sells beauty products from a catalogue. She sells Unique and Avon products, two different cosmetic companies. This second job pays for her English studies, and she requires the loan to help her with the monthly payments for her English classes, to buy books and continue studying. The member is requesting the loan to invest in paying for her English studies.
The member is happy with the loan granted and is committed to keeping to the paying it back in installments within the established timeframe.

loan.use: The member is requesting the loan to invest in paying for her English studies.

loan.name: Ejidal Group

texts.es:
La seÃ±ora MarÃ­a Sonia V. DomÃ­nguez, vive en la ribera Morelia Municipio de Coapilla Estado de Chiapas MÃ©xico, vive en uniÃ³n libre con el seÃ±or Federico PÃ©rez Gomes en donde procreo dos hijas que aun esta a su responsabilidad quienes son: MarÃ­a FÃ¡tima de cuatro aÃ±os y la mÃ¡s pequeÃ±a EstefanÃ­a de dos aÃ±os. El prÃ©stamo solidado lo invertirÃ¡ en la compra de ropas para luego venderlo en la misma localidad, en donde le va bien ya que a obtenido buenos ingresos, como tambien clientes que le compran por mayoreo con esta actividad lleva dos aÃ±os. Por su propia voluntad inicio con esto ya que tambien quiere apoyar asu esposo con los ingresos de su hogar y dÃ¡ndole lo mejor a sus hijos en educaciÃ³n lo mÃ¡s necesario. De lo que va obteniendo lo vuelve a invertir en la misma ya que hay ropas que se le terminan muy rÃ¡pido y su clientela se lo pregunta, para ello no darle una negatividad en no tenerla. Su deseo mÃ¡s grande es que con el tiempo logre tener mÃ¡s grande su negocio para que con ello logre sacar adelante a su familia que es lo mÃ¡s importante para ella. Su grupo se llama "Ejidal" la razÃ³n del nombre es porque donde ellos viven esta cerca una casa ejidal. Las personas que forman el grupo son la siguiente:
MarÃ­a Sonia V. DomÃ­nguez: invertirÃ¡ el prÃ©stamo en la compra de ropas para luego venderlo en la misma localidad.
Olga Lidia V. PÃ©rez: invertirÃ¡ el prÃ©stamo en la compra de pollos por reja para luego venderlo en la misma lo calidad.
VÃ­ctor V. PÃ©rez: invertirÃ¡ el prÃ©stamo en la compra refrescos para luego venderlo en la misma localidad.
Bernardina V. V.: invertirÃ¡ el prÃ©stamo en la compra de roperas para luego venderlo en las comunidades cercanas de su localidad.
texts.en:
MarÃ­a Sonia V. DomÃ­nguez lives in Morelia neighborhood, in the town of Coapilla, in the State of Chiapas, Mexico. She lives with her common-law husband, Federico PÃ©rez Gomes. They have two daughters who are still in their care: four year-old MarÃ­a FÃ¡tima and the youngest, two year-old EstefanÃ­a.
MarÃ­a Sonia will invest her loan in buying clothes that she will then sell in her town. Her business does well and she has made good income. She also has customers who buy from her wholesale. She has been in this business for two years. She started her business on her own initiative since she wanted to support her husband with their household expenses and provide their children with the best possible education, which is the most important thing.
MarÃ­a Sonia re-invests the money she makes in the business since there are clothes that run out very quickly and her customers ask her for them. She doesn't like to have to disappoint them, telling them that she doesn't have them. Her biggest dream is to expand her business over time so that, through her business, she can get her family ahead in life which is the most important thing for her.
MarÃ­a Sonia's group is called "Ejidal" (Co-operative). The reason behind the name is that where the group members live, there is a co-operative building.
The people who make up this group are:
MarÃ­a Sonia V. DomÃ­nguez, who will invest her loan in buying clothes to sell in the town
Olga Lidia V. PÃ©rez, who will invest her loan in buying live chickens which she will then sell in the town
VÃ­ctor V. PÃ©rez, who will invest his loan in buying soft drinks which he will sell in the town
Bernardina V. V., who will invest her loan in buying wardrobes that she will then sell in neighboring communities

loan.use: To buy clothes such as t-shirts, blouses, pants, etc. to sell in her region

loan.name: Marcos

texts.es: Marcos, de 55 aÃ±os, estÃ¡ casado con Edubina, de 45 aÃ±os. Ambos tienen 4 hijos: Josue, de 20, Mirtha, de 23, Dair, de 12 y Esther, de 17 aÃ±os. En uniÃ³n familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserÃ­o de Cumutay. EstÃ© responsable hombre se dedica a la agricultura, hace ya 20 aÃ±os, de los cuales obtuvo muchos beneficios, como pagar los estudios de sus hijos. Sus principales sembrÃ­os constan de arveja, en sus 6 hectÃ¡reas de terrenos agrÃ­colas, los que ahora ya estÃ¡n creciendo satisfactoriamente, y muy pronto cosecharÃ¡. Pero consiente de los gastos de la familia, Marcos tambiÃ©n puso hace algunos aÃ±os, un pequeÃ±o locutorio que genera 30 soles de ganancias diarias; y de la misma manera trabaja como albaÃ±il construyendo diversas casas, en donde le pagan a diario. Ahora el desea ahorrar al mÃ¡ximo para poder proyectarse en el pago de los estudios superiores de sus hijos. Es el dÃ©cimo crÃ©dito con MFP, y como presidente de su banco comunal, es una persona responsable y honesta. De obtener el crÃ©dito que solicita, lo invertirÃ¡ en la compra de varios sacos de abono orgÃ¡nico para esparcirlos en sus terrenos agrÃ­colas.
texts.en:
Marcos is 55 years old and married to 45 year-old Edubina. They have 4 children: 20 year-old Josue, 23 year-old Mirtha, 12 year-old Dair and 17 year-old Esther. They live in their own home in the village of Cumutay.
This responsible man has worked as a farmer for 20 years. He has obtained a lot of benefits from his work such as being able to pay for his children's studies. His main crops are peas which he grows on his 6 hectares of farmland. His current crops are growing satisfactorily and he will harvest them very soon.
As he is aware of his family expenses, Marcos set up a small public telephone business some years ago. This business makes 30 soles profit a day. He also works as a construction worker, building houses. He is paid by the day for this work. Right now, Marcos would like to save as much as he can so that he can pay for his children's higher education.
This is Marcos' tenth loan with MFP and, as president of his community bank, he is a responsible and honest person. He will invest his loan money in buying several sacks of organic manure to spread on his farmland.

loan.use: To buy sacks of manure

loan.name: Rosa Gladys

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal â€œPADRE ETERNOâ€; Este banco estÃ¡ ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra: Rosa; La socia tiene 45 aÃ±os de edad, es casada; la socia trabaja en la Instituto Nacional de Cultura, la socia paralelamente trabaja vendiendo ropa, ella suele viajar en las vacaciones para la ciudad de Lima y trae de las fÃ¡bricas de ropa, ella trabaja vendiendo a sus compaÃ±eros en su instituciÃ³n, la socia tambiÃ©n tiene a una de sus hermana en Lima y le envÃ­a novedades y ropas cuando ella le solicita. La socia requiere el prÃ©stamo para viajar y traer mercaderÃ­a de verano. La socia solicita el prÃ©stamo para hacer de el un capital para la compra de ropa al por mayor.
La socia estÃ¡ feliz con el prÃ©stamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: This member belongs to the "Eternal Father" community bank which is located in the district of Huanchac in the province of Cusco. Her name is Rosa. She is 45-years-old and is married. She works at the National Institute of Culture and also sells clothing. She travels on holidays to the city of Lima and brings her clothing with. There she sells to her coworkers at the Institute. Rosa also has a sister in Lima and sends new clothing when asked. She is requesting the loan so she can travel and buy summer merchandise and to purchase wholesale clothing. Rosa is happy with the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loan.use: To buy wholesale clothing

loan.name: Maria Esmeralda

texts.es:
DoÃ±a MarÃ­a Esmeralda R. E., vive en chicoasen Estado de Chiapas MÃ©xico es casada. Su esposo y ella tienen cuatro hijos a su responsabilidad y son: Arleny JazmÃ­n de once aÃ±os en sexto de primaria el otro es Marlon de nueve aÃ±os, Noelia de cinco aÃ±os y el mÃ¡s pequeÃ±o es Ãngel NoÃ© de dos aÃ±os.
El prÃ©stamo solicitado lo invertirÃ¡ en una nueva actividad que es la de venta de zapatos de la marca Andrea, en esto lleva cuatro meses y comenta que le estÃ¡ yendo bien en este negocio.
Se animo ya que es una actividad en el cual se puede apoyar cubriendo sus gastos pequeÃ±os generados en su hogar y en la educaciÃ³n de sus hijos que estÃ¡n estudiando.
Para iniciar esta actividad se informo como es el negocio le agrado y es asÃ­ como hoy estÃ¡ participando en este negocio en donde le va bien.
De la ganancia que valla obteniendo lo estÃ¡ invirtiendo en lo mismo y con esto tambiÃ©n cubrir sus pagos puntuales en fundaciÃ³n realidad.
Su sueÃ±o es que logre tener con el tiempo su propio negocio en donde le dÃ© buen rendimiento y pueda salir adelante con fu familia.
texts.en:
MarÃ­a Esmeralda R. E. lives in ChicoasÃ©n, in the State of Chiapas, Mexico. She is married and has four children in her care: 11 year-old Arleny JazmÃ­n who is in the sixth year of elementary school, 9 year-old Marlon, 5 year-old Noelia and her youngest, 2 year-old Ãngel NoÃ©.
MarÃ­a will invest her loan in a new business activity selling Andrea-brand shoes. She has been in this business for 4 months and she tells us that it is going well.
MarÃ­a started this business because she wanted to be able to support her husband in covering their small household expenses and also support her children's education (her children are studying). In order to set herself up in this business, MarÃ­a found out the business and liked what she learned. She is now working in the business and it is going well.
MarÃ­a will re-invest the profits that she makes back into her business and also cover her loan repayments to FundaciÃ³n Realidad which she will make punctually. Her dream is to own her own business which will be very profitable and enable her to get herself and her family ahead in life.

loan.use: To buy shoe catalogs so that she can make orders and then make sales in her town

loan.name: Silvia

texts.es:
Silvia M. GonzÃ¡lez, vive en barrio la villita de Chico asen Estado de Chiapas MÃ©xico, vive en uniÃ³n libre con el seÃ±or Martin LÃ³pez LÃ³pez y con quien tiene tres hijos a su responsabilidad: Viridiana de dieciseis aÃ±os, carolina de tres aÃ±os y el mÃ¡s pequeÃ±o es cristofer de tres meses.
Se dedica a vender comida y solicito el prÃ©stamo para la compra de ingredientes que utiliza para elaborarlo, con esta actividad lleva siete aÃ±o y medio y cometa que la bien desde que inicio con esta trabajo.
Para emprenderÃ© esta actividad lo motivo una cuÃ±ada que tambiÃ©n se dedica a este tipo de negocio y le va bien por eso le dio animo a doÃ±a Silvia y poner su venta de comidas y le estÃ¡ dando buen resultado.
Durante los siete aÃ±os que ha estado trabajando a tenido buenos resultados porque gracias a esto ha sacado adelante a su familia a un quÃ© pequeÃ±a pero muy importante para ella.
Para ser parte del programa se informo de los crÃ©ditos en el cual hoy estÃ¡ participando. Su mÃ¡s grande sueÃ±o es que su negocio este siempre estable y seguir adelante con esto que tanto le gusta.
texts.en:
Silvia M. GonzÃ¡lez lives in La Villita neighborhood, in ChicoasÃ©n, in the State Chiapas, Mexico. She lives with her common-law husband, Martin LÃ³pez LÃ³pez with whom she has three children who are in her care: 16 year-old Viridiana, 3 year-old Carolina and her youngest, 3 month-old Cristofer.
Silvia sells meals and she is requesting this loan so that she can buy the ingredients she uses to prepare her meals. She has been in this business for seven and a half years and she says that it has gone well since she started.
It was one of Silvia's sister-in-laws who pushed her to start this business. Her sister-in-law also works in this type of business and it has gone well for her so she encouraged Silvia to set up her own business selling meals and it has produced good results.
During the seven years that she has been working, Silvia has obtained good results in her business which has enabled her to get her family ahead in life. This might have been in small ways but it has been very important for her.
Silvia found out about the loans that we provide and she now takes part in our program. Her biggest dream is for her business to always remain stable and to keep going with this business that she enjoys so much

loan.use: To buy ingredients to make meals

loan.name: Patricia

texts.es:

Esta es la segunda vez que solicita el prÃ©stamo para invertirlo en una nueva actividad que es en la elaboraciÃ³n de tamales en donde lleva cuatro meses y cometa que le va bien ya que esta obteniendo buen resultado.
Su motivo a esta actividad es para apoyar asu esposo y juntos aporten ingresos en su hogar sacando adelantÃ© a su familia ya que para ella es lo mas importante.
De la ganancia que va obteniendo lo invierte en lo mismo comprando mas ingredientes y asÃ­ su negocio valla a aumentando dÃ­a con dÃ­a y mejor sea su ganancia.

texts.en:
Patricia GarcÃ­a R. lives in La Villita de Chico neighborhood in the state of Chiapas, Mexico. She is married to NoÃ© MarroquÃ­n Morales who is a bricklayer and who works outside of their village. They have five sons and daughters who they are still caring for: Griselda Abigail, fourteen, Mayra Edith, nine, Diego de Jesus, seven, Jonathan Benjamin, two, and the youngest, Cristian Felipe.
This is the second time she has requested a loan for a new project. She has been making tamales for four months and she says that it is going well and sheâ€™s getting good results.
The reason she is doing this work is to help support her husband and together they carry the household expenses that gets their family ahead. This is very important to her.
She uses the earnings that she receives in the business for buying more ingredients and seeing that every day her profits grow.
Her dream is to be able to save enough to get her family ahead giving them what is necessary for their education and what they are able to accomplish.

loan.name: Leonardo Daniel

texts.es:
Leonardo Daniel DÃ­az LÃ³pez, estudia administraciÃ³n de empresas y va en quinto semestre, vive en Tecpatan Estado de Chiapas MÃ©xico, es soltero con muchos deseos de terminar su carrera.
Trabaja en el taller mecÃ¡nico que tiene su papa y en eso se poya para pagar sus estudios, se siente contento y muy satisfecho ya que gracias a el esta aprendiendo avalarse por si mismo en la vida.
Solcito el prÃ©stamo para invertirlo en una boneterÃ­a, comprando mochilas, juguetes y sandalias en donde lleva practicando desde hace cuatro aÃ±os y comenta que le va bien ya que de ello obtiene tambien para cubrir su gastos generados en la escuela.
Se inspiro en esta actividad ya que para apoyarse en sus estudios tiene que tener de donde obtener ingresos en sus gasto generados y decidiÃ³ poner esta actividad, como tambien apoyar a su papa con el taller.
De lo que obtiene de su venta de la boneterÃ­a, invierte de nuevo en la compra de masa cosas, con lo que le queda lo guarda para pagar su colegiatura en la escuela que es muy importante cubrirla.
Su deseo es que termine su carrera que es lo que mas desea tener y asÃ­ con el tiempo logre tener su propia empresa en donde pueda apoyar a mas personas que necesitan empleo.
texts.en:
Leonardo Daniel DÃ­az LÃ³pez is studying business administration. He is in his fifth semester. He lives in Tecpatan, in the State of Chiapas, MÃ©xico. He is single and is very keen to finish his studies.
Leonardo works in his dad's auto repair shop and this is how he supports himself and pays for his studies. He feels happy and very satisfied as, through his work, he is learning to support himself in life.
Leonardo is requesting this loan to invest in his sales business. He would like to buy backpacks, toys and sandals. He has been in this business for four years and he comments that it is going well since he makes enough to cover his college expenses. Leonardo went into this business as he needed money to cover the expenses he was incurring in his studies. He decided to carry out this business activity as well as supporting his father in his workshop.
Leonardo re-invests the money that he makes in his business in buying new products. He saves what he has left over to pay his school fees which it is important that he cover. His wish is to finish his studies. This is what he most wishes for. Over time, he would like to own his own business, through which he can support other people who need work.

loan.use: To buy merchandise for his notions store

loan.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:

Carmen; La socia tiene 53 aÃ±os de edad, es casada; la socia tiene 3 hijos, las socia trabaja en su librerÃ­a cristiana, ella elabora tambiÃ©n manualmente todo tipo de arte con motivo de la religiÃ³n cristiana y empastan libros y canticos, la socia apertura hace muy poco su librerÃ­a y estÃ¡ muy eiz de haberlo logrado a su edad, segÃºn ella manifiesta, la socia ahora solicita el prÃ©stamo para poder implementar su librerÃ­a con los Ãºltimos acabados que siempre se requiere y la adquisiciÃ³n de libros que le estÃ¡n enviando de la capital. MarÃ­a D. Carmen, 53, is a member of the â€œPADRE ETERNO" (Eternal Father) communal bank located in Huanchac district, Cusco department.
She is married and has three children. She works in her Christian bookstore and also does Christian-themed religious crafts and binds books and hymnals. She opened her bookstore a short while ago and is very happy to have done so at her age, as she states.
She now needs a loan to do the final finishing touches to the bookstore and to stock her store with books that are being sent to her from the capital. She is requesting a loan to acquire Christian books to stock her bookstore.

loan.name: Diana Mariela

texts.es:
Diana de 23 aÃ±os, es una joven emprendedora que tiene un negocio de cabinas telefÃ³nicas y recargas celulares. Ella empezÃ³ hace 5 aÃ±os atrÃ¡s con su negocio para mantener a su hijo ya que es madre soltera.
Viviendo en una zona periurbana ha podido tener su propio negocio de cabinas de telÃ©fono en donde ofrece el servicio de llamadas a celulares, locales. TambiÃ©n ofrece el servicio de recargas de celulares y venta de accesorios telefÃ³nicos. En la actualidad trabaja desde las 08h00am hasta las 19h00pm en el local.
Sigue siendo una mujer trabajadora y sabe que es muy capaz para seguir agrandando el negocio por eso quiere con el prÃ©stamo comprar tarjetas para recargas celulares, accesorios celulares etc. Uno de sus objetivos de aquÃ­ en 5 aÃ±os es tener un cyber.

Diana is 23 years old. She is an enterprising young woman who has a business providing telephone booth services and cell phone top ups. She started her business 5 years ago to support her child as she is a single mother.
Diana lives in a peri-urban area. She has her own telephone booth business where she offers calls to cell phones and local calls. She also offers a service providing top-ups for cell phones and selling telephone accessories. She currently works in her premises from 8.00am to 7.00pm.
Diana continues to be a hard-working woman and she knows that she is very capable of expanding her business. For this reason, she would like to use this loan to buy top-up cards for cell phones, cell phone accessories, etc. One of her goals is to own her own Internet cafÃ© within 5 years.

loan.name: Dina

Pero como buena comerciante, tambiÃ©n vende queso del caserÃ­o de San Juan, todos los miÃ©rcoles en el mercado mayorista de su cuidad. Dina, 46, lives with AmÃ©rico, 50. They have four children but only three still live with them in their own house located in San Juan. loan.name: Daniel

Practica esta actividad desde muy pequeÃ±o ya que gracias su padre quien lo corriÃ³ de su casa tuvo que comenzar atrabajar y por unos tÃ­os entro atrabaja en un taller del cual le gusto y se preparo para mejorar su aprendizaje. De lo que trabaja durante todos los dÃ­as lo invierte en lo mismo para comprar mÃ¡s herramientas que utiliza para la compostura de los automÃ³viles que repara y para eso solicito el prÃ©stamo para apoyarse con los gastos. Mr. Daniel is married to Mrs. Adela with whom he has four children. One daughter, Iris Guadalupe, 17, still depends on him. She is in the 5th semester of high school.

He has been in this line of work since a very young age because his father threw him out of his house and he had to start working. Some uncles helped him get a job in a shop and he liked the work and prepared himself to improve during his apprenticeship.
He works every day and invests in his job to buy the tools and supplies he uses to repair automobiles. This is why he has asked for a loan to help out with these expenses.
What he wants is to save up to improve his shop as well as to support his daughter who is studying and wants to finish a career that will be of use to her when she grows up.

Mr. Adalberto A. Cohue lives with Mrs. Deonila SolÃ­s LÃ³pez and has three children who are in Middle and High School in his care: Brayan, 15, Brianda, 12, and Ailim, five months.

From what he earns he invests in the ingredients he uses to prepare the meals his customers consume and so that he can prepare what they want to eat and be satisfied with the service.

loan.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa M. I. vive en la cabecera municipal del municipio de Axochiapan Morelos, MÃ©xico. Tiene 69 aÃ±os, sin estudios elementales. Su prÃ©stamo lo va a utilizar para surtir de mercancÃ­as su negocio de venta de zapatos, ella vende los dÃ­as sÃ¡bados y domingos en la plaza principal de Axochiapan, vende calzado para dama y caballero. Tiene 3 aÃ±os con su negocio y antes vendÃ­a comida en el mismo puesto del mercado, pero despuÃ©s le comentaron que era mejor negocio la venta de zapatos y decidiÃ³ cambiar el giro de su negocio. Su hijo la apoya llevÃ¡ndola a comprar zapato LeÃ³n Guanajuato, MÃ©xico. IniciÃ³ su negocio invirtiendo el dinero que tenÃ­a en una tanda y se estableciÃ³ en su domicilio. Su parte favorita del negocio es que puede ver su dinero crecer en vez de gastarlo y que ella administra su propio negocio. Algunas de los desafÃ­os que ha enfrentado su negocio es el aumento de la competencia, pues hay mÃ¡s puestos de zapatos en el mercado. El prÃ©stamo de KIVA y FundaciÃ³n Realidad lo va utilizar para comprar mÃ¡s calzado de otro tipo para que la gente le compre mÃ¡s. La seÃ±ora RosalÃ­a M. es casada, su esposo es campesino, tiene 10 hijos todos ya se casaron y viven aparte, nadie mÃ¡s vive en su casa y nadie de su familia la ayuda con su negocio. So comunidad le gusta porque es donde ella naciÃ³ y la gente es amble y se conocen entre todos. Su negocio le ha ayudado a salir adelante con los gastos de su casa y para aumentar su negocio. Los planes que tiene para el futuro son sembrar unas tierras que tiene en los campos de labranza de la localidad. Se siente contenta de recibir el apoyo de KIVA y fundaciÃ³n Realidad para llevar a cabo sus planes. Sus palabras para el equipo de KIVA fueron las siguientes â€œâ€¦les doy las gracias por el prÃ©stamo que nos dan (sic) y por atendernos para que nuestro negocio crezcaâ€¦â€
